TopicTitle: Flag textures are not properly reversed on back side.

Articles.Content:
A very minor bug/missing feature: Flags should have their texture reversed on the back side; as though there were a single pattern showing through both sides of the fabric.

good point, I really hoped they would add mesh distortion to flag models as of KSP2, since originally the point of Squad was: flags that are planted on the Mun (read: on celestial bodies without atmosphere) are planted on a pole with another plank to hold upper edge of the flag in unfolded attitude - but that looked really weird on Kerbin\Eve\Duna - there probably should be 2 separate models of the flag - one should include mesh distortion for atmosperic bodies and then uvw should be set as you suggested - a flag is a piece of see-through colorized fabric, after all
